messages.subject: Re: Why have kids...?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/18/2003 1:54:19 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Reminds me of this joke.... This guy always hated doing chores when he was a kid. He
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/18/2003 1:54:19 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> >My question to him would be, "Why have children if you don't want to see or
> >hear them?"
> >Tia
> >
>
> JEEZUS, Tia---to carry on the family name and to do chores! REALLY, the
> questions, here! <g>
>

Reminds me of this joke....
This guy always hated doing chores when he was a kid. He couldn't wait until
he was grown up and didn't have to do chores anymore.

When he finally grew up, it was great. He didn't have to do chores, could eat
junk food whenever he wanted...really fabulous.

One day he looked around and realized the place was a dump. He said, "Man, I
gotta have some kids!"


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
